column6: FEAR ITSELF TIE-IN! The world has plunged into an abyss of terror and despair, and few places are worse right now than in Las Vegas, where the hammer-wielding XXXX XXXXX is passing though -- in his own unstoppable way! Luckily, HARDBALL and his HEAVY HITTERS are here to save the day! Um, right, Hardball and the Heavy Hitters? Right...?
column8: | penciller (cover):Giuseppe Camuncoli | colorist:Vero Gandini | writer:Sean McKeever | penciller:Mike Norton | editor:Lauren Sankovitch
